ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Cash and experience
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you tried South Karanas? It was good hunting for me at that level. Lots of Aviarks and Knolls etc. Then I moved on to Great Divide and started out hunting
ygData.messageBody:
Have you tried South Karanas? It was good hunting for me at that level. Lots
of Aviarks and Knolls etc. Then I moved on to Great Divide and started out
hunting Tizmaks.

Good luck!
Steve

Mage 45
Kane Bayle


Politics is the show business of industry. --Frank Zappa
----- Original Message -----
From: "mlockridge01" <MLockridge01@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 05, 2002 7:07 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Cash and experience


> I have been hunting Snow Cougars in Iceclad for a level and a half.
> The experience is good, and whether solo or duo the time invested is
> about the same. Not bad, but I am not making any money.
>
> Previously I farmed Brutes in Warsliks Woods. Nominal experience, but
> made lots of cash.
>
> Any ideas where I can go as a lvl 35 Druid to get a good balance of
> cash/loot and experience? Mostly I solo, as I am usually in for an
> hour at a time. Get in a few hours together now and then, but for
> short sessions getting a group consumes most of the time available.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
